h1: How Many Calories in a Fireball Shooter?
assumptions: Standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) shot of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky (33% ABV), no mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact pour size, and formulation; alcohol content affects calorie count. Consume responsibly and check labels.

quick_answer.text: A standard Fireball shooter contains about 108 calories, mostly from alcohol and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Fireball shooter?
faqs.a: Approximately 108 calories for a standard 1.5 oz shot.

faqs.q: Does a Fireball shooter have carbs or sugars?
faqs.a: Yes, about 11 g carbs, all from sugars, with no fiber or protein.

faqs.q: Are there any fats in Fireball whisky?
faqs.a: No fats, saturated fats, or cholesterol in a pure Fireball shooter.

faqs.q: How does shot size affect calories in a fireball shooter?
faqs.a: Larger pours increase calories proportionally; a 1 oz shot is ~72 kcal.

faqs.q: Is Fireball low-calorie compared to other shooters?
faqs.a: Similar to many liqueurs at ~108 kcal per shot, but higher sugar than straight spirits.
